title: (Fri Full) Lunchbox Auditions with Director of Vegas Production + Amy’s HUGE Water Bill Update + Someone Wants to Pirate Bobby’s Comedy Show This Weekend
itunes:title: (Fri Full) Lunchbox Auditions with Director of Vegas Production + Amy’s HUGE Water Bill Update + Someone Wants to Pirate Bobby’s Comedy Show This Weekend
description:
The day has come for Lunchbox to prove whether he has it or not to be an actor. He auditions for the fancy director of a big Vegas production with an acting, singing and improv portion. Amy got a $600 dollar water bill recently and she shares an update. Someone has a new business idea that will rip. Off Bobby’s comedy show this weekend. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
